name: Dungeon Tiles (itch)
description:
Dungeon Tiles is a tile based game (similar to minesweeper) where you make your way through levels of a dungeon while avoiding traps and collecting gold.

This game was made in less than one week  for the Game Dev Network - Cherry Jam https://itch.io/jam/game-dev-network-cherry-jam

Version 1.2 stuff:

  • Surrounding tiles are revealed at the beginning of each level
  • moving to blank tiles now reveals all tiles in the group
  • tiles now have 3 numbers (to make it easier to tell what number you're standing on)
